content:
![](https://preview.redd.it/ulzyiwntto9e1.jpeg?width=558&auto=webp&s=1df67b072496901ea65017a7cc2e7dec9a929c72)

While trying to make the â€œSword of Lightâ€ railgun because it is pretty cool, I found a problem that I struggle to overcome: how does she even aim this thing?

Bonus information: In railguns, capacitors taking up a ton of space. And more capacitors = more power. If you ever saw a sci-fi railgun and wanted to make it in real life, most of the times you wonâ€™t find much space to place capacitors. It takes like a kilogram of capacitors to store as much energy as a pistol bullet! But Arisâ€™ chunky railgun has more than enough space to place these giant electrolytic capacitors, making it unironically a very good design.
title: How does Arisu aim her railgun
